root.name: Avernum 5
root.description: OverviewAvernum 5 is a computer-based role-playing game in the Avernum series. It was released on the MAC on November 14, 2007, and a PC release followed on February 28, 2008. Using the same game engine as its predecessor, the player is tasked with finding the antagonist, the assassin Dorikas, and his rebel group, the Darkside Loyalists.The game features nine character classes with over 80 area's to explore. You can choose different sides with their own beliefs, cities and npc's.Original PC System RequirementsPC Running Windows 98 or later or Macintosh running System 10.3.9 or later.50 MB free RAM.200 MB hard disk space.1024x768 screen resolution with 16 bit color (Windows) or 32 bit color (Macintosh).Avernum 4 runs natively on Intel Macintoshes.Steam System RequirementsOperating system:Windows® XP / Vista™ / Windows® 7Processor:1.6 GHz CPUMemory:512 MBHard disk space:300MBVideo: OpenGL compliant graphics cardSound:Sound card
